weapons.name: Heavy Psy-Torrent
weapons.label: Heavy Psy-Torrent (9", A2, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)

gains.name: Heavy Slashing Blade
gains.label: Heavy Slashing Blade (A6, AP(1), Reliable, Rending)

option.label: Heavy Slashing Blade (A6, AP(1), Reliable, Rending)

loadout.name: Heavy Slashing Blade
loadout.label: Heavy Slashing Blade (A6, AP(1), Reliable, Rending)

upgrade.label: Any model may replace one Razor Claws
Any model may replace one Razor Claws
Any model may replace one Razor Claws

specialRules.name: Poison Mist
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, roll one die. On a 4+ two enemy units within 6" take 1 hit with Blast(6) and Poison.

specialRules.name: For the Hive!
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get Furious next time they charge. If they already had Furious, they get extra hits from Furious on unmodified rolls of 5-6 to hit instead.

specialRules.name: Born for War
specialRules.description: For each unmodified roll of 6 to hit in melee, this model may roll +1 attack with that weapon. This rule doesnâ€™t apply to newly generated attacks.

specialRules.name: Explode
specialRules.description: If this model is killed in melee, the attacking unit takes X hits. If this model survives melee, after both sides have finished attacking, it is immediately killed, and the enemy unit takes X hits.

specialRules.name: Exploding Spores
specialRules.description: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one extra wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.

specialRules.name: Spell Warden
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick one friendly Caster within 12", which gets +1 to its next spell casting roll.

specialRules.name: Pheromones
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one other friendly unit within 12", which may move by up to 6".

specialRules.name: Psychic Synapse
specialRules.description: Pick one model in this unit to have Caster(X), where X is the total number of models in this unit. If the model is killed, pick another to be the new caster, and transfer all spell tokens to it. The caster loses all unspent spell tokens at the end of the round.

specialRules.name: Takedown
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model attacks in melee, you may pick one model in the unit as its target, and make 1 attack at Quality 2+ with AP(1) and Deadly(3), which is resolved as if it's a unit of 1.

specialRules.name: Corrosive
specialRules.description: Whenever this model takes a wound in melee, the attacker takes 1 hit.

specialRules.name: Regenerator
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +1 to Regeneration rolls next time it takes wounds.

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Psy-Barrier
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die, and on a 6+ it is ignored. If the wound was from a spell, then it is ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: No Retreat
specialRules.description: Whenever a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to fully destroy it, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Shrouding Mist
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12", which get Stealth next time they are shot at.

specialRules.name: Resistance
specialRules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die, and on a 6+ it is ignored. If the wound was from a spell, then it is ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: Breath Attack
specialRules.description: Once per this model's activation, before attacking, roll one die. On a 2+ one enemy unit within 6" in line of sight takes 1 hit with Blast(3) and AP(1).

specialRules.name: Spawn
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model is activated, you may place a new unit of X fully within 6" of it.

specialRules.name: Surprise Attack
specialRules.description: This model counts as having Ambush, and may be deployed up to 1" away from enemy units. Once deployed, roll X dice. For each 2+ one enemy unit within 3â€ takes 2 hits with AP(1).
